verses.name: Revelation 10:1
verses.text: And I saw another mighty angel come down from heaven, clothed with a cloud: and a rainbow was upon his head, and his face was as it were the sun, and his feet as pillars of fire:

verses.name: Revelation 10:2
verses.text: And he had in his hand a little book open: and he set his right foot upon the sea, and his left foot on the earth,

verses.name: Revelation 10:3
verses.text: And cried with a loud voice, as when a lion roareth: and when he had cried, seven thunders uttered their voices.
